phrases: Long ago, a five-headed dragon lived in this ocean.
The violent dragon caused much suffering for the people.
Eventually, a black cloud covered the sky,
bringing a deep, deep darkness with it.
Just when everyone had given up
and thought the world would end, something happened.
A single ray of light shone down from the sky.
An unearthly beautiful princess arrived riding on a purple cloud.
The woman smiled, and her smile illuminated our dark world.
What are you going to do?
I am sure you are all very sad,
but he has to leave because of his family's work.
How many times have I gone through this?
Let us hear from Sanada-kun one last time before he leaves.
But I never know what to say.
I did not make a single friend or any fond memories.
Do not look at me like that.
You should not be carrying something so heavy!
I will be so lonely without you.
We were only here a short while,
but thank you for all you have done.
Where are we going next, Grandma?
I am sure we will find something good there.
And that is where I will be working.
Are you really going to school?
It makes no difference if I go today or tomorrow.
I hope you make lots of friends.
I am used to transferring by now.
Smile, and hold your head high.
Looks like they serve it raw or boiled.
Will you promise me something, then?
Why do you think he came here?
He is probably just another tourist.
He is not that old yet.
If I give up my seat, he would probably be offended.
I cannot give up my seat now.
But if I do not, he will think I am cold.
What am I going to do?
What am I going to do?!
They both go to my school.
I will get it right this time.
We have got two transfer students today,
but I guess one of them's running late.
Could you go ahead and introduce yourself?
I have transferred more times than I can count,
but I am still not accustomed to introducing myself,
so sorry if I seem a little awkward.
I saw the ocean on my way here.
You can see the ocean from Enoshima.
The ocean's really big, the sky's beautiful,
and the air is really nice.
I have not thought about what to say after that.
What am I going to do?
I will just calm down and go my desk.
I hope you will all be nice to Sanada-kun.
That was probably the best I have ever done.
I am sure he will have trouble at first,
and I expect all of you to give him a hand.
All I did was stand up!
Did he just call himself an alien?
How does he know my name?
Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on.
What is wrong with his face?
I am not angry or anything.
This is just the face I make when I freak out.
There is something off about those two.
But they make a good team.
It is the kid from this morning.
We are in the same class.
Among high schoolers, he is strong at the national level.
If you call me that at school, I will kill you.
I do not want to die!
What is with that water gun?
Prince, you will teach us to fish, will not you?
No, that is how you fish with bait.
This is how you use a lure.
If you are not going to fish, go home.
No one asked you to say that.
That is how you fish with bait.
You have to throw your lure where the fish are.
I do not know the first thing about this.
Why is he so angry, anyway?
What am I supposed to do?
How am I supposed to do
I cannot do this any more!
Come on, come on, come on!
A sea bass will shake its body to unhook the lure.
Do not panic, or you will lose him.
It means he will get away.
I am sure I will forget all about it soon.
The line broke, and it got away.
No, I went with a kid from my class.
He is not really my friend.
Grandma, what is going on here?
As of today, Haru's going to be living with us.
Is not it a wonderful idea?
Haru suddenly appeared before me that day.
I never dreamed it would happen.
Hey, let us save the world together.
we would actually end up saving the world.
